channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Telegram billionaire Pavel Durov’s arrest risks fanning diplomatic tensions between France, Russia and the UAE
item.description: Durov's messaging platform is used by nearly a billion users, and has played an especially key role in the Russia-Ukraine war.

item.title: 5 things to know before the stock market opens Tuesday
item.description: Here are five key things investors need to know to start the trading day.

item.title: Colleges need to offer better return on investment, argues university economist
Peloton’s former billionaire CEO says he’s lost all his money and had to sell his possessions
item.description: "I've lost all my money," says Peloton's ex-CEO John Foley

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg says White House 'pressured' Meta to 'censor' Covid-19 content
item.description: Zuckerberg said it was ultimately Meta's decision to take down any content, but he noted he believes that the so-called "government pressure was wrong...

item.title: JD.com buying back $5 bln of stock after Walmart stake sale
Zuckerberg blasts Biden administration for pressuring Meta to censor COVID content
item.description: "I feel strongly that we should not compromise our content standards due to pressure from any administration in either direction—and we're ready to pu...

item.title: Eli Lilly releases new form of weight loss drug Zepbound for half the price
item.description: Eli Lilly is offering 2.5-milligram and 5-milligram single-dose vials of Zepbound for $399 per month and $549 per month, respectively.

item.title: Bronfman drops bid to buy Paramount, clearing the way for Skydance deal
Max Verstappen’s undefeated home record is broken: Is this the beginning of the end for the Dutchman’s Formula One supremacy?
item.description: Lando Norris, the British driver two years Verstappen's junior, is seen as the most likely pretender to the Dutch crown.

item.title: Tuesday's analyst calls: Coca-Cola a top pick, Netflix gets a price target increase
item.description: A beverage giant and a streaming powerhouse were among the stocks being talked about on Tuesday.

item.title: Economists: Home prices won’t fall meaningfully without ‘significant’ job losses
Jury deliberating fate of Nevada politician accused of killing reporter who uncovered his affair
item.description: Closing arguments were heard Monday. Telles is accused of stabbing German after he learned that the reporter was about to expose an affair.

item.title: Britpop legends Oasis reunite for 2025 tour — and demand for tickets is expected to be huge
item.description: Brothers Liam and Noel Gallagher will put aside a 15-year feud to reunite for a string of shows expected to generate feverish demand.

item.title: Shorts to a job interview? Gen Z is still confused about what to wear to work.
